name: The Lucidity of Twisted Dreams
description:
This game was made for the Game Dev 101 Jam #2 'LUCIDITY'.

Story

You have fallen asleep and are now trapped within your own dreams. You must traverse through the different levels of your dream and make it to the end in order to wake up. But if you die in a  dream you descend to the previous level, be careful though if you die too much you may be trapped in your dream forever.

In order to escape each level and make it to the exit by manipulating the 1st-4th dimension.  Also as you progress through the levels you will gain new powers represented by colored crystals and pressure plates.

Controls KeyMoveWASD
JumpSpaceTo kill enemy's while standing on Red, Yellow, and Orange pressure platesEMove blocks while standing on Purple, Blue, and Aqua pressure plates or Crystals Arrow keysChange the camera to the 1st Dimension view
1Change the camera to the 2nd Dimension view2Change the camera to the 3rd Dimension view3Change the camera to the 4th Dimension view4
